Name: Endless Inside
About the game: Endless Inside mix free exploration mode and different countdown survive modes where the player will have to solve and discover the secrets of an old art university. Get ready to solve puzzles and hide to survive. On this place you will meet all beings who are waiting to get revenge and know about them to understand the story. Features: 6 playable phases 3 alternate endings Extra survive mode Optional hidden secrets Updates of this game will be free after your first purchase.
